item.title: Adjusting Gait Timing with an ESP32-based Web Framework in MicroPython
item.description: I have been working on this for a while… For the past two Summers I have been teaching a summer camp about “foldable robots”; I teach kids how to make mechanisms with folded cardboard and paper.
